sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SIREX, in zoology, a genus of animals belonging to the claſs of inſects, and to the order of hymenopterae. The mouth has two ſtrong jaws ; there are two truncated palpi or feelers, filiform antennæ, an xſerted, ſtiff, ſerrated sting, a feſſile, mucronated abdomen, and lanceolated wings. There are ſeven ſpecies.
